lyrics:
8 contributorsthe worst hangover ever lyricsintro
ballroom scene but the fire underneath
gonna eat you alive gonna bring you to your knees

verse 1
went out drinking late last night i had a blast
but now the morning light has come and kicked my ass woah

chorus 1
ive got the worst hangover ever
im crawlin to the bathroom again
it hurts so bad that im never gonna drink again

verse 2
and by my seventh shot i was invincible
i would have never thought id be this miserable woah

chorus 2
ive got the worst hangover ever
im rollin back and forth on the bed
im worked so bad that im never gonna drink again

bridge
wont someone just kill me
put me out of my misery
im makin deals with god ill do anything
make it stop please make it stop please
make it stop please make it stop please
see the offspring liveget tickets as low as 56you might also likeinterlude
woah

chorus 1
ive got the worst hangover ever
im crawlin to the bathroom again
it hurts so bad that im never gonna drink again

outro
ill probably never drink again
i may not ever drink again
at least not til next weekend
im never gonna drink again1embed
